EmailTemplate.name: AM Application Extended Deadline
EmailTemplate.subject: I AM the Challenge! Don't MISS out!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
If you cannot see this image, please see attached flyer.
The deadline to apply to be an Associate Mentor on the Graduate Summer Programme has been extended to 12th May. Please do not miss out! Contact phil.gurney@the-challenge.org for more info or to be sent an application form.
There are only a handful of spaces left! Act now! Take the Challenge to the next level!
